title: Development permission around the periphery of Gaothan boundary shall be allowed as per the Regulation mentioned as below
clause_text: Development permission around the periphery of Gaothan boundary shall be allowed as per the Regulation mentioned as below. This regulation shall be applicable only for the Rural centre and rural area. (excluding nine urban centre area) Regulation for residential zone and other regulation shall be applicable.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Development permission around the periphery of Gaothan boundary shall be allowed as per the Regulation mentioned as below. This regulation shall be applicable only for the Rural centre and rural area.
